testcase.name: must set the language to the default one
must set the language to the one specified in the configuration
must throw an error when language is missing
must throw an error if cookiesecret is missing
must merge the credentials.conf and server.conf
must load an error component and loading component if none of the two is set
must load an error component and leave the loading component if it is set
must load a loading component and leave the error component if it is set
must not load the default loading and error components if they are not set
